fullText: Adrienne Warren gives a powerhouse performance that captures both Turner's explosive energy and her hard-won vulnerability in this crowd-pleasing biomusical.
dtliExcerpt: Adrienne Warren gives a powerhouse performance that captures both Turner's explosive energy and her hard-won vulnerability in this crowd-pleasing biomusical.
bwwExcerpt: "Now, that's what I call a Broadway show!" That's what the stranger sitting next to me at the Lunt-Fontanne Theater yelled into my ear at the roof-raising finale of "Tina: The Tina Turner Musical." I'd say he nailed it. Call "Tina" a jukebox musical or a bio-musical or anything you want to call it, but above all, this is one fine specimen in the best showbiz tradition of the Great Big Broadway Musical.
